examples.example: 周末我打算请客，和朋友们一起去享受美食。

translate.english: On the weekend I plan to treat guests and go with friends to enjoy delicious food.

examples.example: 我升职了，决定请客和同事们一起庆祝。

translate.english: I got promoted and decided to treat my colleagues to celebrate together.

examples.example: 这次比赛我得了第一名，我决定请客和大家一起分享这份喜悦。

translate.english: I won the first place in this competition, and I decided to treat everyone to share this joy.
